name: Tennis For Two?
description:
My entry for the GMTK Jam. The theme was "Genre without Mechanic"

This is a Tennis game without opponent.

Arrow Keys: Move Up Arrow: Jump Space: Hit the ball T: Spawn a new ball

Tip: If the ball get stuck or goes out of bounds, press T to spawn a new one.

Note: This is a narrative game. Send the ball at the wall and see what happens
